title: Social Digest: Paris–Not-So-Nice, Engines for Hand Warmers and Pogačar Corrects Reporters
content:
Last week's WorldTour racing was a crash fest, and the gravel community rallied together after wildfires. That and more in this week’s Social Digest.

Read the full article at Social Digest: Paris–Not-So-Nice, Engines for Hand Warmers and Pogačar Corrects Reporters on Velo.
author: Julia Dowd
